title: 123 Perch Land for Sale - Ideal for an Apartment Project
details:
REF NO: LFS0006

120 perch land for sale in good location not too far away from the main road.

The land is by far the biggest plot of land in the area and is ideal for an apartment complex as there is a lake in front along with a jogging track which is under the purview of the RDA.

Interested parties are requested to send in their letter of interest to No. 05, Aloe Avenue, Colombo 03
